item.title: Sovereignty Scale: A Path to EU Digital Independence
item.description:
Introducing the Sovereignty Scale: A Path to EU Digital Independence

In today’s digital landscape, the concept of sovereignty has become increasingly important, especially within the European Union (EU). As geopolitical circumstances evolve, there is a growing demand for sovereign cloud and tech solutions that can rival the dominance of Big Tech companies like Amazon, Google, and Microsoft. However, the path to achieving true digital independence is complex and multifaceted. This is where the Sovereignty Scale comes inâ€”a novel concept designed to measure and promote progress towards EU digital sovereignty.
